page.title: 20CHANGES IN OUR VILLAGE
page.content: New people have come to live here because houses have been built but families are smaller.The schools have changed from the old council and church school to the present system. { Shops}are better now but there are less of them.There are not so many jobs availaso people have to travel to find work.They go to Hexham,Newcastle and elsewhere sometimes coming home at weekends only. The{facilities}are good for the size of the village.There is now a library, a new doctors' surgery and plans for an ambulance station. There are still many activities for people and these are better than before.You can go to night classes,bingo,carpet bowls and whist drives. { Public transport}needs improving but people find the village is tidier now and a pleasant friendly place to live.
